column4: I want to install Ubuntu to a PC without the desktop enviroment. Can the server version do the trick?
What exactly are the backports in Synaptic?
I stay at 7.10 because my USB CDROM doesnt like 8.04 nor for some reason does my wireless which is flawless in 7.10
backports are new packages that re redone for older versions.... sry if some else already answered
